title: The Chap-book :
snippet: Ephralm Brown walked down the street with his heart beating racingly. " It 's my place to look out for my flock," he said to himself, but when he was in his room above the Mission Hall he flung up both his windows and then tramped the little room fiercely.

title: Fishers of men,
author: Crockett, S. R.
snippet: and Mr. Molesay employed him, both to speak in the Cowgate City Mission Hall, and, above all, in managing to organize the singing, which was his great attraction.
